[00:00.00]Cross Roads (Explicit) - Youngboy Never Broke Again
[00:05.58]Suede this my s**t
[00:10.15]All the way home
[00:11.95]Trauma Tone
[00:23.85]All the way home
[00:27.15]Crossroad I know
[00:30.42]Tonight somebody won't make it home
[00:34.19]Out here on my own
[00:37.03]Somebody tell me where I went wrong
[00:39.76]I need ten of 'em
[00:41.08]Too rich for that bulls**t all these n***as gonna make me tend to 'em
[00:44.33]N***a came up out the bullpen ridin' with a full clip
[00:46.50]I say give it to 'em
[00:47.94]I'm the one took that L
[00:49.24]They who gained they ain't win nothin'
[00:51.03]Tryna get over his pain leave a stain okay
[00:53.26]Caught a n***a lackin' got him 'round my way
[00:55.18]I'ma move around you just pull up and spray
[00:57.02]Meet me in Valley Park get the payment after dark
[00:59.03]Homicide ridin' down 38
[01:00.28]Brainstorm at night don't see nothing
[01:02.42]Look for you at night guess that love s**t it don't mean nothing
[01:05.53]These killers with me they mean all harm oh
[01:09.00]Lost in the streets and that s**t taking my soul
[01:12.19]They'll step on me s**t that's for all that I know
[01:15.67]Back against the wall I'll blow my pole
[01:17.52]Trapped I ain't get no code
[01:18.77]I don't owe them s**t probably owe my bros
[01:20.42]My love on full I'm f**king on her with no rubber
[01:22.43]It's gutter I struggled
[01:23.14]I let her go shopping for me
[01:24.40]'Cause I know that it's all on the muscle
[01:25.86]Teach you how to hustle
[01:26.65]This Givenchy 'fit I got on that you bought me these h*es love it
[01:29.90]Brand-new whip tell them people don't touch it
[01:31.77]Fear of God on they can't tell I'm clutching
[01:33.53]I need ten of 'em
[01:34.96]Too rich for that bulls**t all these n***as gonna make me tend to 'em
[01:37.88]N***a came up out the bullpen ridin' with a full clip I say give it to 'em
[01:41.39]I'm the one took that L
[01:43.04]They who gained they ain't win nothin'
[01:44.68]Tryna get over his pain leave a stain okay
[01:47.24]Maserati truck
[01:47.96]Skrrt skrrt
[01:48.50]I'm gone
[01:48.97]Murder I'ma pray that I make it back home
[01:50.64]Dump dead Q feel everything gone
[01:52.25]Dave dead I just want everybody gone
[01:53.73]Late-night blues at the cemetery
[01:55.54]Go and catch a body I'll see you in Heaven
[01:57.44]Northside 38 4Trey steppin'
[01:58.82]Green leave you red that's flag activity
[02:00.64]Stay sticked up that's real infinity
[02:02.85]Big bro chemist in the kitchen
[02:04.23]Young bad b***h I ain't got no chemistry
[02:06.24]Gravedigger chain that's history
[02:07.16]I know for a fact broke n***as not feelin' me
[02:09.59]N***a just keep your distance
[02:10.67]I can bet a hundred racks that they plan on killing me
[02:12.80]F**k that better yet bet a million
[02:14.58]All the way home
[02:17.82]All the way home
[02:20.83]All the way home
[02:24.07]All the way home
[02:28.88]Crossroad I know
[02:30.96]Tonight somebody won't make it home
[02:33.57]I bet these b***h-a*s n***as won't make it home
[02:35.47]Out here on my own
[02:37.02]F**k 'em
[02:37.41]Somebody tell me where I went wrong
data.trans:
[ti:Cross Roads (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:Top (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.58]DJ Suede制作
[00:10.15]回家的路上
[00:11.95]Trauma Tone制作
[00:23.85]回家的路上
[00:27.15]站在十字路口 我知道
[00:30.42]今晚有人再也回不了家
[00:34.19]单打独斗 取得如今的成就
[00:37.03]有人指出我犯下的错误
[00:39.76]我要杀个片甲不留
[00:41.08]对这些人来说 我腰缠万贯 所有人都想拉拢我
[00:44.33]这些家伙来势汹汹 带着装满子弹的枪狂奔
[00:46.50]我说教训他们
[00:47.94]我是那个承担损失的人
[00:49.24]那些有所收获的人 其实无法获胜
[00:51.03]试图忘记他的痛苦 留下污点
[00:53.26]趁其不备教训他一顿 让他在我身边徘徊
[00:55.18]我四处走动 你只是四处扫荡
[00:57.02]跟我在Valley公园碰面 夜幕降临之后就能拿到钱
[00:59.03]横冲直撞 动手杀人
[01:00.28]午夜的头脑风暴 什么都看不见
[01:02.42]夜晚四处寻找你 我想这就是爱吧 这毫无意义
[01:05.53]杀手与我如影随形 他们心狠手辣
[01:09.00]在街头迷失自我这一切夺走我的灵魂
[01:12.19]他们会从我身上踏过 这就是我知道的事实
[01:15.67]身处绝境 我会放手一搏
[01:17.52]身陷囹圄 我无能为力
[01:18.77]我跟他们两不相欠 也许亏欠我的兄弟
[01:20.42]我充满爱意 我与她尽情缠绵
[01:22.43]我在底层社会奋力拼搏
[01:23.14]我让她帮我去买东西
[01:24.40]因为我知道我实力雄厚
[01:25.86]教你如何挣钱
[01:26.65]我穿着你为我买的纪梵希行头 这些妹子非常喜欢
[01:29.90]崭新的车子 告诉大家别乱碰
[01:31.77]敬畏上帝 他们看不出来我胜券在握
[01:33.53]我要杀个片甲不留
[01:34.96]对这些人来说 我腰缠万贯 所有人都想拉拢我
[01:37.88]这些家伙来势汹汹 带着装满子弹的枪狂奔 我说教训他们
[01:41.39]我是那个承担损失的人
[01:43.04]那些有所收获的人 其实无法获胜
[01:44.68]试图忘记他的痛苦 留下污点
[01:47.24]玛莎拉蒂跑车
[01:47.96]//
[01:48.50]我消失得无影无踪
[01:48.97]性命岌岌可危 我祈祷我能回到家里
[01:50.64]心如死灰 已经麻木不已
[01:52.25]Dave离开人世 我希望所有人都一命呜呼
[01:53.73]深夜时分 在墓地黯然神伤
[01:55.54]我得去干掉一个人 我与你在天堂相见
[01:57.44]4Trey在北方混得风生水起
[01:58.82]把你打得落花流水 这就是号召力
[02:00.64]全副武装 较量永不停歇
[02:02.85]我的兄弟在厨房里研制好货
[02:04.23]我对年轻貌美的女孩没有一点感觉
[02:06.24]开着Gravedigger越野车 戴着金链子 这已经成为往事
[02:07.16]我知道一个身无分文的家伙无法体会我的心情
[02:09.59]那就跟我保持距离
[02:10.67]我赌上一大笔钱 他们计划干掉我
[02:12.80]我甚至敢赌上一百万
[02:14.58]回家的路上
[02:17.82]回家的路上
[02:20.83]回家的路上
[02:24.07]回家的路上
[02:28.88]站在十字路口 我知道
[02:30.96]今晚有人再也回不了家
[02:33.57]我敢打赌这些怂货再也回不了家
[02:35.47]单打独斗 取得如今的成就
[02:37.02]干掉他们
[02:37.41]有人指出我犯下的错误
